## Author Checklist

### Quality
- [ ] PR title follows `type(scope): description`
- [ ] Lint, typecheck, and build pass locally
- [ ] No debug logs, dead code, or unresolved TODOs

### Security and Data Safety
- [ ] Tenant/data boundaries preserved
- [ ] No secrets committed or exposed client-side
- [ ] Threat model completed for high-risk changes (`docs/03-architecture/threat-model-lite.md`)
- [ ] Security review report completed for major/high-risk changes (`docs/06-quality/security-review-report-template.md`)
- [ ] Deferred security items recorded in `docs/07-devops/security-exception-register.md` (if any)

### Docs and Governance
- [ ] Relevant docs updated under `docs/`
- [ ] Major trade-offs logged in `docs/02-planning/decision-log.md`
